Installation

From PyPI

pyliquid is installable from the PyPI via pip:

pip install pyliquid

From Source

The source code can also be cloned from the GitHub repository and installed using pip. This method allows for installation of development versions other than the stable release version (main branch).

# clone latest stable release (main branch)
git clone https://github.com/PNNL-m-q/pyliquid.git

# OR clone the development branch
git clone --branch dev https://github.com/PNNL-m-q/pyliquid.git

# OR clone a specific feature development branch
git clone --branch add_multi_dim_filter https://github.com/PNNL-m-q/pyliquid.git

# install
pip install pyliquid/

Dependencies

  • h5py

  • hdf5plugin

  • matplotlib

  • numpy

  • pandas

  • scipy

  • matplotlib
